files.description: Defines the versioned results schema, provides runtime validation/coercion helpers, and exposes a single function to build a compliant /outputs/results.json payload.

Summary: Added a versioned results schema with coercion, validation, hashing, and a single payload builder for deterministic results.json generation.

missionDescription: Define a stable results schema (fields + version) for /outputs/results.json and enforce it in code + tests; pin randomness (seed) and plotting parameters to ensure figure determinism.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
